item.title: 맥케이(McKay) - Angel 2 Me (Duet.Jeff Bernat)
item.description:

I love you
And I just wanna
show you
From the way you
touch me and kiss me
To the sparkle
in your eyes

how I love you
I just feel so lost
without you
